name: Pietramina
description:
Pietramina is a game where the player chooses who they want to approach the game. In this 2D platformer, the player can explore and collect scrap to buy upgrades or can run straight to the boss. This was a two man project for my Intro to Game class at Becker College and this project utilizes Unity's 2D Game Kit to allow us to focus on core gameplay. 

Controls

WASD: Movement

Space: Jump

O: Gun

K: Melee
